short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Gives quick details about your countries Covid 19 situation.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This simple program using an api to track the current and total cases of the CoronaVirus, as well as other information about the CoronaVirus such as the total amount of people saved from it. Simply type in your countries name, press enter or search, and then see the data about Covid-19 in your country.
